mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store( store_name, type, license_number, address, store_no, table_count, address, post_code, detail_address, extra_address ) VALUES #{storeName }, #{type }, #{licenseNumber }, #{address }, #{storeNo }, #{tableCount}, #{postAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress} );
mapper.select: SELECT store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, type, license_number as licenseNumber, address, store_no as storeNo, table_count as tableCount FROM store WHERE store_no=#{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET store_name= #{storeName}, type= #{type}, address= #{address}, store_no= #{ownerNo}, table_count= #{tableCount} WHERE store_no = #{storeNo}
